definition: being on the left side, (of actions or states) slightly short of or not quite accomplished, move towards
details:
adjective
- being on the left side
= synonyms: nigh
- not far distant in time or space or degree or circumstances
= example: not far distant in time or space or degree or circumstances
= synonyms: nigh
- very close in resemblance
= synonyms: approximate
- with or in a close or intimate relationship
= synonyms: dear
- giving or spending with reluctance
= synonyms: close, skinny, cheeseparing, penny-pinching
- closely resembling the genuine article
= example: closely resembling the genuine article
adverb
- (of actions or states) slightly short of or not quite accomplished
= synonyms: about
- near in time or place or relationship
= example: near in time or place or relationship
= synonyms: nigh, close
verb
- move towards
= synonyms: approach
